projects.name: The deck.gl ecosystem
projects.description: A suite of composable open source frameworks for high-performance web-based visualization

entries.name: deck.gl
entries.description: GPU powered, geospatially optimized visualization layers for large scale data.

entries.name: @kepler.gl
entries.description: A framework for building state-of-the-art geospatial applications.

entries.name: pydeck
entries.description: Python notebook bindings for deck.gl.

entries.name: kepler.gl
entries.description: The famous geospatial app for interactive exploration of geospatial data using deck.gl.

entries.name: I3S Explorer
entries.description: Inspect massive 3D data in I3S, 3D Tiles and similar formats. Built with deck.gl and loaders.gl.

entries.name: AVS/streetscape.gl
entries.description: Autonomous vehicle visualization built on deck.gl (independent project).

entries.name: hubble.gl
entries.description: Animation and video capture module for deck.gl and kepler.gl.

entries.name: flowmap.gl
entries.description: A powerful flow map drawing layer for visualization of geographic movement.

entries.name: graph-layers
entries.description: Graph visualization layers for deck.gl.

entries.name: editable-layers
entries.description: High-performance feature editing layers for deck.gl.

entries.name: arrow-layers
entries.description: Arrow visualization layers for deck.gl.

groups.title: Integrations
groups.description: Deep integrations with other major visualization projects

entries.name: react-map-gl
entries.description: React wrapper for Maplibre and Mapbox GL JS.

entries.name: react-google-maps
entries.description: React wrapper for Google Maps.

entries.name: @deck.gl-community/leaflet
entries.description: Unofficial deck.gl basemap integration for Leaflet.

entries.name: @deck.gl-community/bing-maps
entries.description: Unofficial deck.gl basemap integration for Bing Maps.

entries.name: luma.gl
entries.description: WebGPU and WebGL2 powered rendering and compute library.

entries.name: loaders.gl
entries.description: Loaders for big data, geospatial and 3D file formats.

entries.name: math.gl
entries.description: Math library for 3D and geospatial calculations.

entries.name: mjolnir.js
entries.description: Event handling library for interactive visualizations.

entries.name: probe.gl
entries.description: Logging and code instrumentation utilities.

entries.name: dev-tools
entries.description: Development tools for vis.gl frameworks.
